meanings.definition: A device used to measure fermentation activity.
meanings.sent1: The zymometer showed how fast the yeast was working.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used the zymometer to check the progress of the fermentation.
meanings.sent3: The zymometer beeped happily when the beer was ready.
meanings.sent4: The zymometer hummed like a busy bee in the brewery.
meanings.sent5: The zymometer's readings danced with excitement as the fermentation completed.

meanings.definition: A tool for determining the rate of fermentation.
meanings.sent1: The zymometer indicated the speed at which the bacteria were fermenting.
meanings.sent2: Bakers rely on the zymometer to know when the dough is ready.
meanings.sent3: The zymometer seemed to have a mind of its own, predicting fermentation times accurately.
meanings.sent4: The zymometer whispered secrets of fermentation rates to the winemaker.
meanings.sent5: The zymometer's numbers painted a clear picture of the fermentation process.
